contents.DIALOGUE: So you want to be a magical girl?

contents.NAME: [color=#24ccff]Miku[/color]
contents.DIALOGUE: To be a magical girl, you need mana first!

First, I'll give you a recipe for a potion at the top!
Then, use your chemicals at the bottom to follow the recipe and get mana!
You'll need to repeat this in order to get enough mana.
Don't take too long though, as you'll only have a limited amount of time to complete all of the recipes!

contents.NAME: [color=#24ccff]Miku[/color]
contents.DIALOGUE: Great! To start, head over to that cauldron on that ledge.
